Longford International School bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-agụkọ akwụkwọ ọnụ na Ebute Metta, Lagos  Steeti, Naijiria. Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye ma Senior School na Junior School Certificate Examinations. E hiwere ya na 24 Jenụwarị 1962; a maara ya dị ka Nigeria People's College (NIGERPECO) n'etiti 1962 na 1986, na Ago-Egba High School n'etiti 1986 n'afọ 2006
